actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to require public disclosure by certain recipients of Federal funds of information required to be kept by such recipients as a condition of receiving such funds.

summary.text: Requires recipients of grants made for other than the personal use of such recipient to make available for public inspection any records such recipient is required to keep as a condition of receiving such grant. Exempts from the provisions of this Act specified information including classified information, trade secrets, and personnel and medical files.

titles.title: A bill to require public disclosure by certain recipients of Federal funds of information required to be kept by such recipients as a condition of receiving such funds.
